desc_c: 由於較早月份的有關調整只會納入累積總數，因此，個別月份數字的總和與累積總數未必相同。
desc_e: The sums of the monthly figures may differ from the cumulative totals because adjustments relating to earlier months are incorporated in the cumulative totals only.

desc_c: 表3.6：對外商品貿易貨值變動情況
desc_e: Table 3.6 : Movement of external merchandise trade values

desc_c: 原來數列的進口貨值按年變動 [%]
desc_e: Year-on-year change of original series of imports [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整數列的最近3個月與對上3個月比較的進口貨值變動 [%]
desc_e: Imports change of the latest 3-month period over the preceding 3-month period of the seasonally adjusted series [%]

desc_c: 原來數列的整體出口貨值按年變動 [%]
desc_e: Year-on-year change of original series of total exports [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整數列的最近3個月與對上3個月比較的整體出口貨值變動 [%]
desc_e: Total exports change of the latest 3-month period over the preceding 3-month period of the seasonally adjusted series [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整的數列可隨着資料更新而作出修訂。在對外貿易數字方面，當每年1月份的數字發表時，會一併修訂對上3年的經季節性調整數列。
desc_e: Seasonally adjusted series may be revised as more data become available.  For external trade figures, the seasonally adjusted series for the preceding 3 years are revised each year when the figures for January become available.

desc_c: 政府統計處貿易資料分析組
desc_e: Trade Analysis Section, Census and Statistics Department

desc_c: 表3.7：商品貿易指數
進口貨值指數 (2017年=100)
進口單位價格指數 (2017年=100)
進口貨量指數 (2017年=100)
整體出口貨值指數 (2017年=100)
整體出口單位價格指數 (2017年=100)
desc_e: Unit value index of total exports (Year 2017=100)

desc_c: 整體出口貨量指數 (2017年=100)
貿易價格比率 (2017年=100)
貿易價格比率指數是根據整體出口的單位價格指數與進口單位價格指數的比率計算出來。
desc_e: The terms of trade index is derived from the ratio of the unit value index for total exports to that for imports.

desc_c: 政府統計處貿易資料分析組
desc_e: Trade Analysis Section, Census and Statistics Department

desc_e: Table 3.8 : Seasonally adjusted merchandise trade index numbers

desc_e: Seasonally adjusted value index of imports (Year 2017=100)

desc_c: 經季節性調整的最近3個月與對上3個月比較的進口貨值變動 [%]
desc_e: Change of seasonally adjusted value of imports of the latest 3-month period over the preceding 3-month period [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整的最近3個月與對上3個月比較的進口貨量變動 [%]
desc_e: Change of seasonally adjusted quantum of imports of the latest 3-month period over the preceding 3-month period [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整的最近3個月與對上3個月比較的整體出口貨值變動 [%]
desc_e: Change of seasonally adjusted value of total exports of the latest 3-month period over the preceding 3-month period [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整的最近3個月與對上3個月比較的整體出口貨量變動 [%]
desc_e: Change of seasonally adjusted quantum of total exports of the latest 3-month period over the preceding 3-month period [%]

desc_c: 經季節性調整的單位價格指數並沒有製備。
desc_e: No seasonally adjusted unit value index is compiled.

desc_c: 經季節性調整的數列可隨着資料更新而作出修訂。在貿易指數方面，當每年12月份的數字發表時，會一併修訂對上3年的經季節性調整數列。
desc_e: Seasonally adjusted series may be revised as more data become available.  For trade index numbers, the seasonally adjusted series for the preceding 3 years are revised each year when the figures for December become available.

desc_c: 政府統計處貿易資料分析組
desc_e: Trade Analysis Section, Census and Statistics Department

desc_c: 涉及外發加工貿易的估計比重 [%] - 從中國內地進口的貨品
desc_e: Estimated proportion of outward processing trade [%] - Imports from the mainland of China
